note: Per requirement, stories in Backlog have no assignee and no sprint. Stage history includes timestamps for each transition. A few Bugs are included in addition to story counts.

items.story: As a customer, I can authenticate with a one-time SMS code, so that I can securely chat without creating an account.
acceptance_criteria: OTP is 6 digits with expiry ≤ 10 minutes; expired or wrong OTPs are rejected with a clear error message.
Resend is rate-limited to ≤ 3 attempts per 15 minutes per phone number.
Successful verification establishes a session linked to the customer record without exposing PII.
Given I am a customer with required permissions, when I authenticate with a one-time SMS code, then the result supports: I can securely chat without creating an account.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a support manager, I can configure escalation rules based on keywords and sentiment, so that conversations hand off to humans at the right time.
acceptance_criteria: Negative sentiment score above threshold triggers handoff within ≤ 30 seconds.
Manual 'talk to agent' always overrides automation and preserves transcript.

Given I am a support manager with required permissions, when I configure escalation rules based on keywords and sentiment, then the result supports: conversations hand off to humans at the right time.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a customer, I can switch languages mid-conversation, so that I can get help in my preferred language.
acceptance_criteria: Switching language mid-chat preserves conversation context and persona.
Glossary terms render using locale-specific translations; dates/currency follow locale formats.
Given I am a customer with required permissions, when I switch languages mid-conversation, then the result supports: I can get help in my preferred language.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a support agent, I can view the bot’s reasoning trace and tool calls, so that I can audit and correct decisions.
acceptance_criteria: Reasoning view shows tool calls, inputs (masked), and outputs with timestamps.
Sensitive fields are redacted according to policy and access is role-gated.
Given I am a support agent with required permissions, when I view the bot’s reasoning trace and tool calls, then the result supports: I can audit and correct decisions.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a customer, I can upload a screenshot of an error, so that the assistant can diagnose my issue faster.
acceptance_criteria: Supported file types: PNG/JPG/PDF up to 5MB; larger files get graceful error.
Images are virus-scanned; PII detection blurs sensitive segments before storage.
Given I am a customer with required permissions, when I upload a screenshot of an error, then the result supports: the assistant can diagnose my issue faster.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a support manager, I can define allowed tools (refund, RMA, order lookup), so that the bot executes authorized actions safely.
acceptance_criteria: Only approved tools are callable; unapproved calls are blocked and logged.
Every tool call is auditable with actor, timestamp, params (masked), and outcome.
Given I am a support manager with required permissions, when I define allowed tools (refund, RMA, order lookup), then the result supports: the bot executes authorized actions safely.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a customer, I can request a live agent at any time, so that I never feel trapped in automation.
As a support manager, I can A/B test prompt templates, so that we increase first-contact resolution.
acceptance_criteria: Metrics reflect events within 5 minutes (p95) of occurrence.
Dashboard filters by date range, channel, and locale; exports CSV.
Given I am a support manager with required permissions, when I A/B test prompt templates, then the result supports: we increase first-contact resolution.

acceptance_criteria: All PII fields are redacted in logs; access is traceable to user identity.

items.story: As a customer, I can resume a previous conversation, so that I don’t have to repeat myself.
acceptance_criteria: Session context survives channel switch (SMS↔Web) within a 1-hour window.
If context is stale, the user is prompted to re-authenticate gracefully.
Given I am a customer with required permissions, when I resume a previous conversation, then the result supports: I don’t have to repeat myself.
Error states are documented and return actionable messages without leaking internal details.
Telemetry logs success/failure events with correlation IDs.

items.story: As a customer, I can check refund eligibility instantly, so that I know my options before contacting an agent.

items.story: Defect: Bot occasionally hallucinates order numbers when KB lookup fails.
Defect: Image attachments >5MB return 500 instead of graceful error.
acceptance_criteria: Reproduction steps documented and reproducible in staging.
Fix prevents recurrence; add regression test covering the repro path.
No related metrics degrade and no new errors appear in logs at p95 over 24h.
Supported file types: PNG/JPG/PDF up to 5MB; larger files get graceful error.
Images are virus-scanned; PII detection blurs sensitive segments before storage.
